column1: SR (June)    Act.      SR (June)        Proj.    SR (June)                         Proj.
Sources: National authorities and Fund staff estimates and projections.
1/ Non-tax revenues deviate from GFSM 2014 accounting with the inclusion of sales of nonfinancial assets and exclusion of BCRA profit transfers. Non-tax revenues in 2022 include
0.3 percent of GDP income from issuance of inflation linked debt securities. This income is excluded from revenues from 2023 onwards.
2/ Includes federal capital transfers to provinces.
3/ Deposit accumulation in 2022 largely reflects Federal Government deposits at the BCRA related to IMF purchases.
4/ Assumes repayment to the Paris Club of the outstanding obligations reprofiled in 2014 by 2026.
5/ Includes Banco Nacion and other public entities.
7/ Corresponds to cash management operations of the non-financial public sector entities (-, deposits).
